statements: SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_records;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM billing_and_payment_records WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, billing_date FROM billing_and_payment_records ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM billing_and_payment_records WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, customer_name FROM billing_and_payment_records ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM billing_and_payment_records WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date FROM billing_and_payment_records WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_records WHERE billing_date < '2022-06-01' AND customer_id IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM billing_and_payment_records WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, billing_date, payment_date, billing_amount FROM billing_and_payment_records WHERE billing_amount < 500 OR payment_date IS NULL ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, bill_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, bill_date, bill_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, billing_records.bill_date, billing_records.bill_amount FROM customers JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 3;

SELECT customers.customer_name, billing_records.bill_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id WHERE billing_records.bill_amount > 100 ORDER BY billing_records.bill_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_records;
SELECT customer_id, billing_amount FROM billing_records ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payment_records WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info;
SELECT * FROM billing_records WHERE billing_amount > 100 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM customer_info INNER JOIN payment_records ON customer_info.id = payment_records.customer_id WHERE payment_amount < 50;
SELECT customer_name, billing_date, billing_amount FROM customer_info INNER JOIN billing_records ON customer_info.id = billing_records.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT customer_name, billing_date, payment_date FROM customer_info INNER JOIN billing_records ON customer_info.id = billing_records.customer_id INNER JOIN payment_records ON customer_info.id = payment_records.customer_id WHERE billing_amount > 200 OR payment_amount < 20;

SELECT billing_records.id, customer_name, billing_date, payment_date FROM customer_info INNER JOIN billing_records ON customer_info.id = billing_records.customer_id INNER JOIN payment_records ON customer_info.id = payment_records.customer_id WHERE billing_amount = payment_amount;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM billing_records ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM customers JOIN payment_records ON customers.customer_id = payment_records.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM customers JOIN payment_records ON customers.customer_id = payment_records.customer_id WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT customer_name, usage_date, usage_amount FROM customers JOIN smart_grid_usage ON customers.customer_id = smart_grid_usage.customer_id WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, billing_date, amount FROM customers JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id;
SELECT meter_id, reading, reading_date FROM meter_readings WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, billing_date, amount FROM customers JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, address, reading FROM customers JOIN smart_meters ON customers.customer_id = smart_meters.customer_id JOIN meter_readings ON smart_meters.meter_id = meter_readings.meter_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(billing_id) AS num_billing_records FROM billing_records GROUP BY customer_id;
